property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your fire creatures. {INVASION}-Fire command (When one of your Fire command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ While this creature is attacking, your opponent can't use "Guard Strike". ■ Each turn, after this creature attacks for the first time, untap this creature and destroy the top card.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your fire creatures. {INVASION}-Fire command (When one of your Fire command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have the highest power.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Legend Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Ultimate Evolution: Put on one of your evolution creatures. ■ Invasion: Fire Evolution Dragon (When one of your fire evolution dragons attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, choose 2 cards from your opponent's mana zone and put them into their owner's graveyard. ■ Meteorburn: When you put this creature, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, this creature breaks all your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. {SUPER}: When you put this creature, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win the game until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand, then draw a card. If this creature evolved from a tamaseed, draw another card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Oni RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card.

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Snow Faerie/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM25-SD2 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Power

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may take an evolution creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
